thread.title: The Internet Is Not Happy with Zoe Saldana Because of These Trump Remarks
thread.title_full: The Internet Is Not Happy with Zoe Saldana Because of These Trump Remarks

title: The Internet Is Not Happy with Zoe Saldana Because of These Trump Remarks
text:
By Kayleigh Roberts Jan 15, 2017 Zoe Saldana isn't a Donald Trump supporter, but she's facing backlash from some liberal fans after her recent comments about the President-elect. Saldana thinks bullying from Hollywood helped Trump pull off his surprising win in November. "We got cocky and became arrogant and we also became bullies," Saldana told AFP . "We were trying to single out a man for all these things he was doing wrong... and that created empathy in a big group of people in America that felt bad for him and that are believing in his promises."   Saldana's comments didn't sit well with some fans, who took to Twitter to make their feelings known. Zoe Saldana: If an individual does wrong, do you not call that individual out &/or do you call out the people who called out the wrongdoing? pic.twitter.com/4zoZEDRNKs 
— Ana (@anazrof) January 15, 2017 Most Popular before you tell people to stop bullying Trump he should stop he is the nastiest man ever ⚡️“Zoe Saldana 
— france bouchard (@francebouchard5) January 15, 2017 @TwitterMoments @zoesaldana I'm done with you if you have anything complimentary to say about this orange trash, and i am a fervent fan. 
— Luther Wood (@loquevapasar12) January 15, 2017 @zoesaldana - Let's not forget Trump bullied a disabled reporter for the whole world to view! You've got no play here!
